Name: Survirus
About the game: Survirus is a simple side-scrolling shooter with a virus motif. The eternal battle that gets harder as you move forward. Few types of enemy, few types of upgrade. So there is no need to think. Just go ahead and challenge your high score.
Meta Description: Looking for information on Survirus? Check out the release date (Apr 14, 2019), developer insights from 24Frame,inc., and a complete game summary.
